OctopusX_Display: Functions to OctopusX sensor by ELECFREAKS Co.,Ltd.
OctopusX_Display.NeoPixelMode: Different modes for RGB or RGB+W NeoPixel strips
OctopusX_Display.TM1637LEDs._dat: set data to TM1637, with given bit
OctopusX_Display.TM1637LEDs.showNumber: Show a 4 digits number on display
OctopusX_Display.TM1637LEDs.showbit: Show a single number from 0 to 9 at a specified digit of Grove - 4-Digit Display
OctopusX_Display.tm1637Create: Create a new driver Grove - 4-Digit Display
OctupusX_Basic: Functions to OctopusX sensor by ELECFREAKS Co.,Ltd.
OctupusX_Basic.MP3SetPort: TODO: Initializing the MP3 connection port as a serial port
OctupusX_Basic.dht11Sensor: get dht11 temperature and humidity Value
OctupusX_Basic.folderPlay: TODO: Specify songs in the play folder
OctupusX_Basic.onGesture: Do something when a gesture is detected
OctupusX_Basic.setTracking: TODO: Specify a song to play
wuKong: Functions to WuKong multifunctional expansion board by ELECFREAKS Co.,Ltd.
wuKong.lightIntensity: TODO: Set the brightness of on-board LED lamp.
wuKong.mecanumWheel|param|LeftFront: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S1
wuKong.mecanumWheel|param|LeftRear: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S2
wuKong.mecanumWheel|param|RightFront: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S3
wuKong.mecanumWheel|param|RightRear: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S4
wuKong.setLightMode: TODO: Set the on-board LED display mode.
wuKong.setMotorSpeed: TODO: Set the speed of M1 or M2 motor.
wuKong.setMotorSpeed|param|motor: M1 or M2 motor , eg: MotorList.M1
